title: General Guy

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Redeploy**: During the day, instantly reroll a target's role. (5 uses)
- **Tank Ride**: Pick a player, the next time they would die, they will survive. (1 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You learn what your targets reroll into.
- You may only reroll your Koopa teammates thrice.
- You may self-target.
